cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{bookedName}@@
fqdn: @@{bookedName}@@.@@{domainName}@@
users:
  - name: ntnxcalm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{sshPublicKey}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:Nutanix2021!
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
#Config net file
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=@@{netDeviceName}@@
      NAME=@@{netDeviceName}@@
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=yes
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{assignedIp}@@
      NETMASK=@@{subnet}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{gateway}@@
      DNS1=@@{dns1}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-@@{netDeviceName}@@
runcmd:
  - [service, network, restart]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{bookedName}@@
fqdn: @@{bookedName}@@.@@{domainName}@@
users:
  - name: ntnxcalm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{sshPublicKey}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:Nutanix2021!
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
#Config net file
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=@@{netDeviceName}@@
      NAME=@@{netDeviceName}@@
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=yes
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{assignedIp}@@
      NETMASK=@@{subnet}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{gateway}@@
      DNS1=@@{dns1}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-@@{netDeviceName}@@
runcmd:
  - [service, network, restart]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

variable_list.name: assignedIp
variable_list.label: Insert IP address for this Blueprint

variable_list.description: This variable is used to set the OS Hostname
variable_list.name: bookedName
variable_list.label: Insert OS Hostname
